001package org.nasdanika.ncore.util;
002
003import java.util.Collection;
004
005import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
006import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
007import org.json.JSONObject;
008import org.nasdanika.ncore.NamedElement;
009
010public class ContainerInfo extends SemanticIdentityImpl {
011
012        public static String REFERENCE_KEY = "reference";
013        public static String NAME_KEY = "name";
014        
015        protected String reference;
016        protected String name;
017
018        public ContainerInfo(
019                        Collection<URI> identifiers, 
020                        String reference, 
021                        String name) {
022                
023                super(identifiers);
024                this.reference = reference;
025                this.name = name;
026        }
027        
028        public ContainerInfo(EObject semanticElement, String reference) {
029                super(semanticElement);
030                this.reference = reference;
031                if (semanticElement instanceof NamedElement) {
032                        this.name = ((NamedElement) semanticElement).getName();
033                }
034        }
035
036        public ContainerInfo(JSONObject jsonObj) {
037                super(jsonObj);
038                if (jsonObj.has(NAME_KEY)) {
039                        name = jsonObj.getString(NAME_KEY);
040                }
041                if (jsonObj.has(REFERENCE_KEY)) {
042                        reference = jsonObj.getString(REFERENCE_KEY);
043                }
044        }
045        
046        public String getReference() {
047                return reference;
048        }
049        
050        public String getName() {
051                return name;
052        }
053        
054        @Override
055        public JSONObject toJSON() {
056                JSONObject ret = super.toJSON();
057                if (name != null) {
058                        ret.put(NAME_KEY, name);
059                }
060                if (reference != null) {
061                        ret.put(REFERENCE_KEY, reference);
062                }
063                return ret;
064        }
065
066}
067
